learnings.learning: All section titles on dark backgrounds need explicit white color (#FFFFFF) - Tailwind classes alone may not work due to specificity
Subtext/descriptions should be text-sm (14px) not text-lg for better hierarchy
Floating stats at top of pages can feel redundant - remove unless they add real value
Nav sidebar needs explicit width values (320px mobile, 380px desktop) for proper slide-out
Journal entries need context/description explaining what prompted the writing - add 'context' field to journal.json
FTI brand colors: Navy #003763, Blue #0067B1, Cyan #00C9D4, Green #1BB680, Coral #E0503D

Check sidebar width and translate-x values. Use fixed pixel widths like w-[320px]
